name: evophase 5
description:
Move - arrow keys
Jump - Space
Evolve up - Page up
Evolve down - Page down

This is my second game ever . My goal was a metrodvania style game. Where you get evolved and get different abilities so you can get to new places in the world. But i got stuck in some coding and other things in life (two small children) so I did not get to level design or to music part. But i learned a lot of new stuff.
